price: “Jedite i pijte, prijatno nek vam je, zbog onog što ste radili.”
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
